remarks: The operation of a quotient structure is a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
qusaddf.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( R /s .~ ) ) $.
qusaddf.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
qusaddf.r $e |- ( ph -> .~ Er V ) $.
qusaddf.z $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
qusaddf.e $e |- ( ph -> ( ( a .~ p /\ b .~ q ) -> ( a .x. b ) .~ ( p .x. q ) ) ) $.
qusaddf.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( p .x. q ) e. V ) $.
qusaddflem.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> [ x ] .~ ) $.
qusaddflem.g $e |- ( ph -> .xb = U_ p e. V U_ q e. V { <. <. ( F ` p ) , ( F ` q ) >. , ( F ` ( p .x. q ) ) >. } ) $.
qusaddflem $p |- ( ph -> .xb : ( ( V /. .~ ) X. ( V /. .~ ) ) --> ( V /. .~ ) ) $.
$d .x. p q x $.
$d .xb a b p q $.
$d .~ a b p q x $.
$d F a b p q $.
$d R p q x $.
$d V a b p q x $.
$d a b p ph q x $.
